para.literallayout: &app; is a BibTeX manager. User can creat, manage and edit a new or existing bibtex file. User can enter each field separately or an complete entry.

listitem.para: Gives user a simple gui to generate and edit bibtex file.
Enable user to search google scholar from the same interface(Search in google scholar webpage, not withstanding their terms of usage,in my knowledge).

sect2.title: Limitations
sect2.para: A major drawback of the program in its current state is, it can not handel latex commands either, i.e. formatting like \textbf{Author's Name} can not be reproduced.
key={value} and more complex format will be supported very soon.

sect1.title: Installation
sect1.para: Installation from source code should be done using standard autotools. Check INSTALL for more details.

sect3.title: Packages required in Fedora(18)
sect3.para: You would run the command: sudo yum install gtk3-devel libsoup-devel gnome-doc-utils rarian-compat

sect2.title: Create New Entry
sect2.para: User can either edit a New file(CtrlNFileNew) , or edit an old file(CtrlOFileOpen) to enter new bibtex entry. Process is straight forward: Choose a file → Enter bibtex specification → Create!

sect2.title: Input a complete Entry
sect2.para: A complete bibtex entry can be inserted using (AltEEditEdit).

sect2.title: Search Google Scholar
sect2.para: You can also search google scholar from the same interface. Enter Author, Title and year(optional) and enter google search scholar button.

listitem.para: Use Title box as keyword, and Author as author(s) name. Year is optional.
You can do better by turning bibtex link in google scholar setting "on"
Here you will find everything you need to know about BibTeX, or such the website clames.
A example most of most used bibtex style's output. Very Helpful.
